title: Venus in Capricorn
summary: Affection is steady, pragmatic, and goal-oriented. Loyalty and reliability matter more than flash. The opportunity is to build trust through consistent action and clear commitments.

meaning.headline: Connection values responsibility, structure, and long-term investment.

frames.text: Venus in Capricorn favors dependable gestures, clear promises, and practical support.
Respect is shown through follow-through and honoring boundaries.
Shared ambitions or projects can deepen bonds.
Elegance leans toward minimalism and quality over quantity.
Serious tone means affection is absent or transactional.

frictions: Rigid expectations of how love should look

do: Make space for affection alongside responsibility.
Invest in quality rather than excess.
Share what support you can offer without overextending.
Acknowledge emotions even when tone is practical.
avoid: Taking on all duties to feel deserving
Using achievements to substitute for intimacy

reusable_lines.text: Steady care and clear promises build trust today.
Let structure support affection, not replace it.

allowed_framing: Supportive framing: can stabilize commitments and boundaries
Agency-forward language: you choose what you can promise
Contextual framing: reliability helps when paired with openness

sources: Venus as relating/values archetype in daily cycles
